goals__remit:
To propagate the correct vision of Islam as a religion which teaches peace and harmony between members of different religions.  
 
To show that Islam teaches Muslims to respect the founders and followers of all religions.  
 
To show that Islam also teaches them to respect the law of the country they live in. If they believe that the law needs to be changed then struggle for it using all lawful means and process. 
 
To show that Islam teaches that women have the same rights as men such as the right to choose their spouse, the right to work, to run a business and the right to education. 
 
Our objective is to ensure that Islam is relevant to the needs of the current time and addresses the issues we now face.
